results.title: Case report: severe symptomatic hyponatremia associated with lisinopril therapy.
results.text_hl: A 63-year-old white female who was being treated for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ presented with @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@, altered mental status, and a serum @CHEMICAL_Sodium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012964 @@@sodium@@@ of 101 mEq/L.

citations.NLM: Subramanian D, Ayus JC. Case report: severe symptomatic hyponatremia associated with lisinopril therapy. Am J Med Sci. 1992 Mar;303(3):177-9. PMID: 1317675
citations.BibTeX: @article{1317675, title={Case report: severe symptomatic hyponatremia associated with lisinopril therapy.}, author={Subramanian D and Ayus JC}, journal={Am J Med Sci}, volume={303}, number={3}, pages={177-9}}

results.title: Prolonged anticoagulant activity of rivaroxaban in a polymorbid elderly female with non-convulsive epileptic state.
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: A 88-years-old female (body-mass-index = 19.95) with @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, hospitalized because of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ and a non-@<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@convulsive epileptic@@@ state, was treated by @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@valproate@@@, mirtazepin, @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Digitoxin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004074 @@@digitoxin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Gliclazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005907 @@@gliclazide@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Stöllberger C, Finsterer J. Prolonged anticoagulant activity of rivaroxaban in a polymorbid elderly female with non-convulsive epileptic state. Heart Lung. 2014 May-Jun;43(3):262-3. PMID: 24794785
citations.BibTeX: @article{24794785, title={Prolonged anticoagulant activity of rivaroxaban in a polymorbid elderly female with non-convulsive epileptic state.}, author={Stöllberger C and Finsterer J}, journal={Heart Lung}, volume={43}, number={3}, pages={262-3}}
